title: Organisation of the body
creator_credit: J. Arthur Rank, Gaumont-British Instructional, Frank Wells and Beryl Denman Lacey
brief_description: Shows, in broad outline, the skeletal, muscular, vascular, respiratory, excretory, endocrine and nervous systems of the human body, and demonstrates the interdependence of these systems and their collaboration in the life of the body as a whole.
creator_credit_for_label: J. Arthur Rank, Gaumont-British Instructional, Frank Wells and Beryl Denman Lacey
